description:
Easy Gemology is the science of natural and artificial gemstones. It falls under the discipline of geo-science and mineralogy. in this course you will learn the following subjects:

1-The Structure of Materials

 2-Structure of The Earth

 3-Plate tectonics

4-Types of rock

5-What are gemstones

6- Rocks & Gems

7-Classifying Gemstone

8- Crystallization in gemstones

9- Properties of Gemstones

10- Light and  gemstones

11- Cause of color in gemstone

12- Color and Crystal form of Gemstone

13- Gemstones and their phenomenal

14- Synthetic process of gemstones

15- Imitation gemstones

16- Why treatment

17- Heat Base Treatment

18- Other method of Treatment

19- Describing of gemstones color

20- GIA method of Color Describing

21- Effective factors on gemstone color

22- How do they cut?

23- Cut style

24- clarity in gemstone

25- Types of Clarity in gemstone

26- Grading  of clarity

27- Grading  of clarity by GIA method

After completing this course you will obtain the ability of recognizing, identifying and judging the colored stones quality. By taking this course you will earn a solid foundation of gemology science
title: Easy Gemology
